References

Source: vignettes/exsampler-references.Rmd
exsampler-references.Rmd

R packages:

The following R packages are used in the exsampler package:

  • ggplot2 (Wickham, 2016)

  • glue (Hester & Bryan, 2024)

  • knitr (Xie, 2025)

  • patchwork (Pedersen, 2025)

  • purrr (Wickham & Henry, 2025)

  • qqplotr (Almeida, Loy, & Hofmann, 2018)

  • rmarkdown (Allaire et al., 2024)

  • shiny (Chang et al., 2025)

  • sn (Azzalini, 2023)

  • stats (R Core Team, 2025)

  • testthat (Wickham, 2025)

Use of Artificial Intelligence

ChatGPT models GPT‑4o and GPT‑5 Thinking (OpenAI, 2024; OpenAI, 2025) were used to assist with code writing, review, documentation, and formatting.

References

Allaire, J. J., Xie, Y., Dervieux, C., McPherson, J., Luraschi, J., Ushey, K., Atkins, A., Wickham, H., Cheng, J., Chang, W., & Iannone, R. (2024). rmarkdown: Dynamic Documents for R (Version 2.29) [R package]. https://github.com/rstudio/rmarkdown

Almeida, Loy & Hofmann (2018). ggplot2 Compatible Quantile-Quantile Plots in R. The R Journal, 10(2), 248-261. https://doi.org/10.32614/RJ-2018-051 248–261.

Azzalini, A. (2023). The R package sn: The skew-normal and related distributions such as the skew-t and the SUN (Version 2.1.1) [R package]. http://azzalini.stat.unipd.it/SN/

Chang, W., Cheng, J., Allaire, J. J., Sievert, C., Schloerke, B., Xie, Y., Allen, J., McPherson, J., Dipert, A., & Borges, B. (2025). shiny: Web Application Framework for R (Version 1.11.1) [R package]. https://doi.org/10.32614/CRAN.package.shiny

Hester, J., & Bryan, J. (2024). glue: Interpreted string literals (Version 1.8.0) [R package]. https://doi.org/10.32614/CRAN.package.glue

Pedersen, T. L. (2025). patchwork: The Composer of Plots (Version 1.3.1) [R package]. https://doi.org/10.32614/CRAN.package.patchwork

R Core Team. (2025). R: A language and environment for statistical computing [Computer software]. R Foundation for Statistical Computing. https://www.R-project.org/

OpenAI. (2024). ChatGPT (GPT-4o, 2024 version) [Large language model]. https://chatgpt.com/

OpenAI. (2025). ChatGPT (GPT-5, 2025 version) [Large language model]. https://chatgpt.com/

Wickham, H. (2016). ggplot2: Elegant graphics for data analysis. Springer-Verlag New York. https://ggplot2.tidyverse.org

Wickham, H. (2025). testthat: Unit Testing for R (Version 3.2.3) [R package]. https://testthat.r-lib.org

Wickham, H., & Henry, L. (2025). purrr: Functional programming tools (Version 1.1.0) [R package]. https://doi.org/10.32614/CRAN.package.purrr

Xie Y (2025). _knitr: A General-Purpose Package for Dynamic Report Generation in R_. R package version 1.50, https://yihui.org/knitr/
